title: lucky80
author: lucky80
content: What are your favorite lines about bitcoin or cryptocurrency guys? Please comment on your original words. I would use it for my content. I will start first:"When you have Bitcoin you feel equal. When you have music you feel sensual" "Humanity is unhappy which makes it waver in every important decision making. Smart-contract is the only solution and they are not volatile."- Lucky Sign aka lucky80 (bitcointalk member)

comments.author: Dariona
comments.body: My favorite line is "I'm a hodler"))))

comments.author: lucky80
comments.body: Quote from: Dariona on January 25, 2023, 11:40:08 AMMy favorite line is "I'm a hodler"))))It is a powerful word. But everyone said that. Get something unique to encourage people more.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Satoshi - “If you don't believe me or don't get it, I don't have time to try to convince you, sorry.” ...Hal Finney - “Running Bitcoin” Michael Saylor - Bitcoin is a bank in cyberspace, run by incorruptible software, offereing a global, affordable, simple an dsecure savings account to billions of people that don't have the option or desire to run their own hedge fund.Adam Back - Σ₀ 1/2ⁿ=2210,000 x 50 x Σ₀ 1/2ⁿ = 21 million #bitcoinAndreas Antonopoulous - Six and a half billion people on this planet have no connection to the world of money. They operate in cash-based societies with very little access to international resources. ​ ​They don’t need banks.

comments.author: Cyber_Alien
comments.body: Wences casares: Bitcoin is not a currency for a government, it is a global currency for the people.

comments.author: lucky80
comments.body: Quote from: DeathAngel on January 26, 2023, 06:39:18 PMSatoshi - “If you don't believe me or don't get it, I don't have time to try to convince you, sorry.” ...Hal Finney - “Running Bitcoin” Michael Saylor - Bitcoin is a bank in cyberspace, run by incorruptible software, offereing a global, affordable, simple an dsecure savings account to billions of people that don't have the option or desire to run their own hedge fund.Adam Back - Σ₀ 1/2ⁿ=2210,000 x 50 x Σ₀ 1/2ⁿ = 21 million #bitcoinAndreas Antonopoulous - Six and a half billion people on this planet have no connection to the world of money. They operate in cash-based societies with very little access to international resources. ​ ​They don’t need banks.Wow great. But I want your original lines also bro. Legendary Member Quote from: Cyber_Alien on January 27, 2023, 08:17:01 AMWences casares: Bitcoin is not a currency for a government, it is a global currency for the people.Bravo bro. do you have your own thoughts about Bitcoin or Crypto?

comments.author: yusrime
comments.body: mine is  not only for shares all type of commodities “fearful when others are greedy, and greedy when others are fearful.”

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: "Bitcoin will not be compromised."Source: someone's signature, when forks were being hyped.

comments.author: lucky80
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on January 27, 2023, 07:00:03 PM"Bitcoin will not be compromised."Source: someone's signature, when forks were being hyped.Another strong word. It seems the guy change his signature but his word is planted in our minds. BRAVO for the nature of Bitcoin!
